Detailed Description

template<typename _T>
class UConstRef< _T >

Purpose: To track reference counts for a const pointer. Deletes when necessary.

File: UConstRef.h Author: Kevin Bray Created: 09-19-04 Copyright © 2004 Bootstrap Studios. All rights reserved. class UConstRef
